Text:
IMPORTANT.

If you have troubles with running the game, install XP Patch in random folder, and than copy files from that folder to the game folder. Then run it from your desktop shortcut.
This is "only" a demo? This game was never released as retail? Only the demo exists?

Its a German Kickstarter Project: http://project-giana.com/ 
The full game will coming soon, i think.
